using System;
using System.Linq;
using System.Reflection;
using System.Threading;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.ExceptionHandling.Input
{
	public partial class DoNotPropagateOperationCanceledException
	{
		public async Task MethodThatCatchesTargetInvocationExceptionAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
		{
			try
			{
				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync(cancellationToken));
			}
			catch (TargetInvocationException ex)
			{
				throw new Exception("My wrapped exception", ex);
			}
		}

		public async Task MethodThatCatchesOperationCanceledExceptionAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
		{
			try
			{
				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync(cancellationToken));
			}
			catch (OperationCanceledException ex)
			{
				throw new Exception("My wrapped exception", ex);
			}
		}

		public async Task MethodWithoutCatchAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
		{
			try
			{
				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync(cancellationToken));
			}
			finally
			{
			}
		}

		public async Task LocalFunctionThatCatchesOperationCanceledExceptionAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
		{
			await (InternalAsync());

			async Task InternalAsync()
			{
				try
				{
					await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync(cancellationToken));
				}
				catch (OperationCanceledException ex)
				{
					throw new Exception("My wrapped exception", ex);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
